name: The Cave Walker Golden Edition
description:
The Cave Walker Created And Programmed by Mazen Khairy, Is a puzzle game where a mother left her's son in a cave to protect him from the war,An earthquake happend destroyed the cave to take the son to another world inside the world of the volcano rich in puzzles under the world,The son decided to get out of the volcano before he burn from the magma.

  • The game based on physics of moving cubes to jump over it to complete the level
  • Every level has a password given in some locations of the level
  • The password of the level can be put in the level select to continue the game
  • The game has physics of destructible meshes
  • There will be a giveaway of the crackdown edition,the vault edition,Ice Land Edition and the golden edition on Indie DB Website
  • This Edition Includes The Normal Edition Levels + Ice Land Levels + The Vault Levels + CrackDown Levels + Golden Edition Special Level In Secret Location Of The Menu
